channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Independent Living
channel.desc: Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: June Beauty Deals
channel.desc: June Beauty Deals.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: FUL London Haircare Solutions
channel.desc: Make every day a great hair day with FUL London, offering incredible haircare to give you that fresh-from-the-salon look every time.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: All about Nails
channel.desc: Showcasing the latest products to help care for your nails, join us for a show of top tips and tools from nailcare brands you trust.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Summer Ready with Margaret Dabbs
channel.desc: Treat your feet to Margaret Dabbs' incredible formulas, from fabulous foot creams to excellent nailcare. Trust the experts to nail your at-home pedi this season and get your feet ready for summer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Independent Living
channel.desc: Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves with Dyson Haircare
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love, featuring Dyson's high-tech Supersonic Hairdryer.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Naturally Active
channel.desc: Liz Earle is an award-winning British beauty brand renowned for creating naturally active skincare and bodycare products, which help to deliver real results for all ages and skin types.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Oskia Skincare with Ali Young
channel.desc: Boost your skin's vitality with Oskia and Ali Young. Discover UK-made, nutritionally advanced skincare blending nature and innovation for visible results.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Percy and Reed Haircare
channel.desc: Percy and Reed brings you new haircare products you always needed but could never find and they only create products which work - bringing British individuality and their own style to your hair.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty's Best Finds
channel.desc: Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.

channel.title: June Beauty Deals
channel.desc: June Beauty Deals.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Discover Beauty with Alpha-H
channel.desc: Give your skin a boost with hi-tech skincare featuring a synergy of blended botanical ingredients coupled with glycolic acid - an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) which occurs naturally in sugar cane.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Meet the Beauty Experts
channel.desc: This show features a wide range of beauty products for your body, face, hair and nails, plus a selection of make-up. Plus our top beauty experts will be on hand to give you great advice and tips.
